data.message: How do i make it so an app cant post to my page?

replies.message: Hi Ian. It's against our policy for an app or game to ask to access your info or post on your behalf without giving you the option to decline. If the app or game continues to ask for your info and doesn't let you cancel the request, please report it at: http://on.fb.me/1DmcaXG  -Ryan

I accidentally allowed it to post on my behalf, though I meant to decline. Now it constantly is reposting the same thing ever ten minutes......Im worried that my friends will start ingnoring my future post....:(
Hi Ian. Our Help Center has information about how to adjust the settings of your apps and games: http://on.fb.me/1ATGCEr  -Ryan
